resources.string: Thank you! Mental support is sufficient at this point!
Changes will take effect after next launch
Do you want to delete this reminder?
One or more Google Service Components unavailable, you might not be able to use the geolocation for the reminders
Connection to Google Play Service is cancelled
Google Play Service is missing on your device, this might result in the unavailability of geolocation function for reminders
Google Play Service on this device is currently updating, please try later
Google Play Service on this device is disabled, please enable Google map function
Please sign in to Google Play Service before using geolocation function
Google Play Service version is too old
Ran into some problems when initialising Google Play Service
"Contacts permissions are needed for providing email completions."
